title: Theses Credendorum Atque Agendorum Fundamentales, Quæ singulos Fidei Articulos, prim`um doctrinalibus, deinde moralibus, & positionibus & quæstionibus, analogice tradunt, ex Scripturis Sacris demonstrant, necessariisque observationibus declarant
creator: Breithaupt, Joachim Justus
subject: Historische Drucke
